original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1001)@</color>在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4480)@</color> 秒內降低全體敵方武將 <color=#ccffcc>22%</color> 的所有抗性，並同時降低全體敵方士兵 <color=#ccffcc>45%</color> 所有抗性。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1001)@</color> within <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4480)@</color> seconds Reduce all resistances of all enemy generals <color=#ccffcc>22%</color>, and reduce all resistances of all enemy soldiers <color=#ccffcc>45%</color>.
